item.title: connecting
item.description:
Knowledge Base Article - CTAC (Communications Training Analysis Corporation)  
=================================================

Subject: Connecting to CTAC dev-nas

Revision History:
    2017-10-12 09:48:14 - Version 1 created by Bao

Details: (include steps to reproduce, symptoms, corrective actions, contact information, links and a any other helpful information)

CI:
 - 172.16.14.25 (Synology disk station 1U)

Prerequisites
- You are connected to CTAC VPN

Steps:
- Open a Finder window
- CMD + K
- in the prompt, type afp://172.16.14.25
- Hit Enter
- Confirm you are connected by clicking on dev-nas in Finder.



=================================================
This document is proprietary and confidential. No part of this document may be 
disclosed in any manner to a third party without the prior written consent of 
CTAC.```

item.title: ctac vpn
item.description:
Knowledge Base Article - CTAC (Communications Training Analysis Corporation)  
=================================================

Subject: CTAC VPN

Revision History:
    2019-11-08 17:56:00 - Version 1 created by Bao

Details: (include steps to reproduce, symptoms, corrective actions, contact information, links and a any other helpful information)
- This applies to CTAC-HQ VPN

Links: http://172.16.14.1
Link for recreation tracking: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hCJ1LABTy7Y1g5Rgg1ciP7hgAOeYDHB1ZLPo5ina4-s/edit#gid=0


Prerequisites
Need to be on CTAC network or VPN'ed in
Credentials are in 1P


Note: This kb created as a result of upgrading the office firewall. it has more to do with recreating VPN accounts. But would also apply to new user creation
- Log into 172.16.14.1
- Apps > OpenVPN > Server > Remove the old user (click the trash can icon and click save)
- Config > Local Directory > Create user, and note the password
- Apps > OpenVPN > Server > create the same user from the previous step


Send an email to the user with the following:
=========
Hello,
Attached are your new VPN files for connecting to CTAC VPN. Instructions below. Let me know if you have issues with connecting.

1) If you already have an existing VPN connection configured, delete it.
2) Unzip the attached file to a directory of your choice
3) Double click on the *.ovpn file to import the connection
4) To test your connection you will need to be outside of the CTAC network

User: <user name>
Password: <onetimesecret.com>
=========


=================================================
This document is proprietary and confidential. No part of this document may be 
disclosed in any manner to a third party without the prior written consent of 
CTAC.```

item.title: ctacorp upgtrade wordpress version
item.description:
Knowledge Base Article - CTAC (Communications Training Analysis Corporation)
=================================================

Subject: ctacorp site upgrade wordpress

Revision History: 
    02-04-2022 13:00 EST - Version 1 created by Bao

Details: (include steps to reproduce, symptoms, corrective actions, contact information, links and a any other helpful information)

If rob asks to upgrade PHP or wordpress version:
go to https://ci.ctacdev.com/job/ctac-docker-wordpress-base/ > Configure > Go to the last execute shell > copy the text > Create a new 'execute shell' > use the WORDPRESS_VERSION that Rob wants.

Add Execute Docker command and use the tag that corresponds to what you've specified in the Execute Shell command.

=================================================
This document is proprietary and confidential. No part of this document may be
disclosed in any manner to a third party without the prior written consent of
CTAC.```
